全国认可的胃肠病学家与纽约大学Langone一起领导小儿IBD计划全国认可的儿科胃肠病学家，医学博士迈克尔·多林格（Michael Dolinger），MBA，加入NYU Langone的Hassenfeld儿童医院，在儿科胃肠病学计划中担任小儿炎症性肠病计划的主任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/nationally-recognized-recognized-gastroterostist--joins-joins-nyu-langone-langone-to-lead-pediatric-ibd-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/nationally-recognized-recognized-gastroctorsist-joins-joins-nyu-langone-to-lead-to-lead-pediatric-ibd-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=127069be-f63e-4e0d-861b-c4a34f0b862d Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:28:44 -0500 Nationally recognized gastroenterologist joins NYU Langone to lead Pediatric IBD Program
研究表明，运动和健康饮食减少绝经后妇女的炎症Jyväskylä大学运动与健康科学学院的研究人员发现，表现出干扰的饮食行为和从事低体育锻炼的女性倾向于具有更多的中央脂肪，并且具有更高的代谢低级炎症风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-shows-ersercise-andercise-and-healthy-eathy-eating-reduce-inflammation-inflammation-in-postmenopausausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-shows-ersercise-andercise-and-healthy-eathy-eathy-eat---------inflammation-inflammation-in-postmenopausausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4443569b9-b33b-4d8e-9f47-9f47-496bcfdc962d Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:22:46 -0500 Research shows exercise and healthy eating reduce inflammation in postmenopausal women
研究发现克罗恩氏病的关节炎症潜在生物标志物根据Weill Cornell医学研究人员的新研究，患有与免疫系统功能障碍有关的患有与免疫系统功能障碍有关的关节炎症患有不同的肠道细菌或微生物群，而Mediterraneibacter Gnavus细菌是潜在的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-finds-potential-biomarker-for-for-joint-inflammation-in-crohns-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-finds-potenty-biomarker-for-for-joint-inflammation-in-crohns-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf6A5C6A5C69-E0CA-4413-B163-301C212985A5 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:09:02 -0500 Study finds potential biomarker for joint inflammation in Crohn's disease
早期接触食物过敏原可能会预防儿童的严重反应临床和实验过敏的综述得出的结论是，将幼儿暴露于少量的食物中，而对完全避免食物更安全，如果发生意外暴露，这可能非常危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/early-exposure-to-food-food-allergens-could-prevent-severe-severe-reactions-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/early-expuse-to-food-food-allergen-could-could-prevent-severe-reevere-reactions-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed12abad-dbcf-42dc-9A2C-5C30B4B41117 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 09:35:04 -0500 Early exposure to food allergens could prevent severe reactions in children
褪黑激素可保护骨骼肌免受“糖尿病”造成的损害由格拉纳达大学（UGR）领导的一项国际研究表明，褪黑激素以调节睡眠/唤醒周期的能力而闻名，可以恢复肌肉纤维的组成，并保护骨骼肌免受肥胖和2型糖尿病造成的损害，称为“糖尿病”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/melatonin-protects-skeletal-muscle-from-damage-caindage-canused-caused-by-diabesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/melatonin-protects-skeletal-muscle-from-damage-caused-caused-caused-cain- by-diabesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5D0B83B8-30DB-49A5-AD7E-659F2AA2D0BB Wed, 05 Mar 2025 09:31:00 -0500 Melatonin protects skeletal muscle from damage caused by "diabesity"

与长期开发有关的铁失调新研究发现，由于SARS-COV-2感染，血液中铁水平的问题以及人体调节这种重要养分的能力可能是长期兴奋的关键触发因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/iron-dysregulation-linked-to-long-covid-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/iron-dysregulation-linked-to-long-covid-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E5BEA20-25BB-4528-A267-A267-A6F1DDCB45A1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 09:14:59 -0500 Iron dysregulation linked to long COVID development
对糖尿病心肌病免疫调节中miRNA角色的新见解宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。糖尿病心肌病（DCM）是一种独立的糖尿病并发症，其特征在于心肌结构，功能和代谢异常，包括心肌收缩性降低，心肌肥大和纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-insights-into-mirna-roles-in-diabetic-cardionyopathy-mimmune-renculation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-insights-into-mirna-roles-in-diabetic-cardionyopathy-mmmune-renculation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8327E2A4-D91A-429D-90DC-CC2B1D0AC43E Wed, 05 Mar 2025 08:37:36 -0500 New insights into miRNA roles in diabetic cardiomyopathy immune regulation
